#summary How to quickly get started with ManiaHost
#labels Featured
= Introduction =

ManiaHost for Maniaplanet is an application that you host and that allows players to rent Dedicated Servers with Planets - giving you additional Planets revenues.

ManiaHost consists of a Manialink where people can come and rent servers for a given amount of time (for as little as 1 hour). The backend of ManiaHome is responsible for starting the Dedicated Servers, handling transactions, etc.

= Requirements =

 * PHP 5.3 or newer
 * cURL extension (http://php.net/manual/en/book.curl.php)
 * JSON extension (http://php.net/manual/en/book.json.php)
 * You must be able to make HTTPS requests on ws.maniaplanet.com
 * A Web server (eg. Apache2)
 * MySQL 5.1 or newer with InnoDB

= Installation =

 # Extract the maniahost package on your server
 # Create a database
 # Import "maniahost.sql" in your created database
 # Configure your Web server to have only the "/www" directory accessible from the Web
 # Setup ManiaPlanet Dedicated Servers
  * Configure your dedicated server by editing the config_cfg.txt file (you can have a single config file)
 # Setup ManiaLive
  *. Configure ManiaLive by editing "config.ini"
  *. Configure the ManiaHost plugin to allow him to connect to the ManiaHost's database with the following parameters:
{{{
   ManiaLivePlugins\ManiaHost\Manager\Config.host = 'xxx'
   ManiaLivePlugins\ManiaHost\Manager\Config.database = 'xxx'
   ManiaLivePlugins\ManiaHost\Manager\Config.username = 'xxx'
   ManiaLivePlugins\ManiaHost\Manager\Config.password = 'xxx'
}}}
 # Create a username and an application on http://developers.maniaplanet.com/webservices/
 # Edit the app.ini (you will find it in the config folder). Fill all the lines that end with an equal symbol
 # Start your dedicated Servers with ManiaLive, keep in mind that the dedicated close every 30 days. Your dedicated servers has to be launch with "/noautoquit" parameter in its command line
